0011101011010111 1100010010011110 0 -> sum: 1111111101110101, cout: 0
1010010111101011 1010100101011101 0 -> sum: 0100111101001000, cout: 1

0111001001111100 1110000100110111 1 -> sum: 0101001110110100, cout: 1
0111100110010011 0111100010110000 1 -> sum: 1111001001000100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
